attributes.action: Stop convicted murderers being taken on shopping trips.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently a convicted murderer escaped while being escorted on a shopping trip.

Surely there is no need for convicted murderers to exit prison on shopping trips.

Shopping online or even a prison officer going and doing the shopping would be better. This would be a good use of technology or just a humble pen, paper and a list.

We would like convicted murderers to be banned from escorted shopping trips.
